ticket.title: ActiveSupport method_missing 'set_exception' on Nil
ticket.original-body: I keep getting this error with Ruby 1.9.1-p378 and 1.9.2-rc2 @@@ text /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/activesupport-3.0.0.beta4/lib/active_support/whiny_nil.rb:48:in ticket.original-body-html:
I keep getting this error with Ruby 1.9.1-p378 and 1.9.2-rc2

/Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/activesupport-3.0.0.beta4/lib/active_support/whiny_nil.rb:48:in method_missing': undefined methodset_exception' for nil:NilClass (NoMethodError)


    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/hooks.rb:39:in `rescue in run_in'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/hooks.rb:35:in `run_in'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/hooks.rb:76:in `run_all!'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/hooks.rb:111:in `run_hook!'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:176:in `block in eval_after_alls'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:176:in `each'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:176:in `eval_after_alls'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:189:in `run'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:186:in `block in run'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:186:in `map'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/example_group.rb:186:in `run'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:42:in `block in run_examples'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:42:in `each'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:42:in `inject'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:42:in `run_examples'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/command_line.rb:25:in `block in run'
    from /Users/sean/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.9.2-rc2/gems/rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17/lib/rspec/core/formatters/base_formatter.rb:37:in `block in report'

version.title: ActiveSupport method_missing 'set_exception' on Nil

version.body:
I think I jumped the gun reporting this issue. I believe this is an issue with rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17. The set_exception is called from rspec.
Please close or remove this ticket.
version.body-html:
I think I jumped the gun reporting this issue. I believe this is an issue with rspec-core-2.0.0.beta.17. The set_exception is called from rspec.

Please close or remove this ticket.
version.title: ActiveSupport method_missing 'set_exception' on Nil
